26 Imgur Creator Spotlight: @adorkastock did this cute pose reference photo of a cuddle puddle. You all know her stuff, just wanted to give her a shoutout for the service she provides!
27 Man Tax: Idris Elba
“Here is the test to find whether your mission on earth is finished: If you're alive, it isn't.” - Richard Bach I try to keep my posts "good vibe zones". So, instead of finding the one thing in here you don't like and commenting only on that, also comment about something you DID like. Balance the negativity. Love you long time. So, I made a discord server. It's a relaxed environment where you can take/donate memes to the cause, play trivia twice a week, chat about lots of topics or about nothing at all. We also have Jack Box game night and are setting up movie night! Very laid back/relaxed vibe. Come hang with us. https://discord.gg/AWFV7FT3RQ I'm also on the imgcat server for updates & fun: https://discord.gg/TpjD37jgJ9 ***Also if you miss abbiistabbii's discord community good news! Here's the new one https://discord.gg/NPStJGgARq - where everyone's reconnecting, shitposting, and hanging out again*** https://ko-fi.com/mememuseumcurator Unable to work, zero income. Feel free to leave me a tip. Those that have, y'all are the bee's knees. You've honestly been my lifeline. ***Tag me if you see an artist/creator you like whose work isn't getting seen as much as it should be! Or if you are an artist/creator and want me to post something of yours, DM me!

item.title: Return of the Meme: 1766 (tie stain rookie)
item.description:
Let's get this bread.
Pippin seems unfazed by his accidental adventure yesterday. I wonder if he flew directly to where I found him, and was there the whole damn time, or was on his way back to trying to find the apartment.
And no, i hadn't "given up," after an hour, it's that I knew the odds for escaped parrots are low as fuck when there's hungry Cooper's Hawks around, and the Imgur post was at the end of a brief break from the search posting on all the social media shit for which I went searching for another few hours, thank you very fucking much.
But then I also assume the absolute worst of almost everyone so, I guess I get it.
Such a cool shot. Fully expect to see @NegasonicAdultEMP steal it... though she hasn't posted in a few, you okay (by 2025 standards) sister?
The middle way, if you're a Buddhist, is that Suicide is a Temporary solution to a Permanent problem (Samsara). Still unreccomended, probably lose points.
I can't remember whether or not glyptodonts lived in Arizona, incidentally. *googles*
Kosmoceratops by James Orr
Cretaceous Landscape by Douglas Henderson
Oh god this reminds me of the time when I was illegally searched by cops at 12 because they assumed I started the fire in the local riparian zone that I almost got surrounded by (by the fore, that is,) when I was birding. They found binoculars, a field guide, two water bottles, an envelope of pigeon feathers, three pieces of red Jasper, two pieces of worn agate, and some wildflowers pressed in the field guide. Eventually they figured out when they rubbed their brain cells together that you probably couldn't start a fire with a pair of binoculars and the kid who was looking at Lucy's Warblers in the riparian forest thar caught fire while he was in it PROBABLY didn't start the fire. That was the moment that radicalized me against cops.
Rook and Raven.
Hahahahahahahahahahahaha
A Proto-Indo-European rhebus dictionary.
BUTLERIAN JIHAD NOW
Beautiful Windfucker painting (European Kestrel)
Pippin tax! Today's message from Pippin: "Good morning. Glory." ______ 1) Are you on the run to a safe place and passing through Arizona on your way to safer grounds? My apartment is open to you to crash at, and it is a safe space. Pippin and I will make you a meal and gladly share tea, wine, or mead with you. 2) Hey! Take your meds with a full glass of water, please. Do it for Pippin, or Space Mom, or better yet, do it for yourself. 3) Ĝefeloað wē. We will carry on. 4) all funds from the sales of items at these two links will be sent to support charities aiding to fight for Trans rights in the US (not just T-shirts!) https://www.teepublic.com/t-shirt/74812801-all-conures-are-anarchists https://www.teepublic.com/t-shirt/74811778-whiptail-pride 5) Since multiple people have requested this over the last two weeks or so, my ko-fi is: https://ko-fi.com/codyandpippin
item.dc:creator: CodyBurkett

item.title: Fruit leather
item.description: INGREDIENTS: 3-4 x cups of fruit 2 x tbsp chia seeds 1 x tbs maple syrup or agave syrup STEP BY STEP: - Add all the ingredients to a blender - Blend until smooth and tip the mixture into a baking tray lined with a silicon pad - Dry at low temp in the oven (80C or 175F) - Cut in stripes, roll and store in jars

item.title: Bad time to be a pediatrician
item.description: I’m a pediatrician. Every day, I fight for kids to get what they need to be healthy, including vaccines. I feel so utterly beat down having to go head to head with the FEDERAL GOVERNMENT, who is simultaneously sowing doubt about the legitimacy of what we do and then using that doubt to suggest that our clinical practices haven’t been studied rigorously enough and need to be reconsidered. This fear mongering has already tangibly reduced vaccination rates and caused preventable pediatric deaths. These new updates will only worsen the situation. I have never felt so fucking demoralized and I just don’t want to do it anymore.
item.dc:creator: reynardtriple4443

item.title: Eyewitness
item.description:
The second half addresses the defense for the shooting that ICE is pushing
There is a video I've put in the comments that shows why filming is so important. In the video, the ICE agent who originally walked towards the passenger side of the car, shielding his face from a citizen outside of the car, continues around to the bonnet. When the two ICE officers who exit the ICE vehicle on the driver side attempt entry to the vehicle, the lady reverses and then goes to pull away. The agent who walked around on her blind side, the passenger side, while her attention is on the two agents who exited the vehicle to her left, now holds his ground in front of the car just long enough to claim that the vehicle headed towards him, even as (a) he was positioned close enough to the left hand side of the car to step out of the way as he shoots and (b) despite the fact that the vehicle is turning right as it moves forward, away from the agent. The witness is slightly ambiguous in his assertion as to which agent fired the shots, showing the importance of filming...preferably letterbox, keeping to a full shot wherever possible. Stay safe, but not at the cost of your freedom.
item.dc:creator: anosebyanyothername

item.title: GovBrief Today #341
item.description: Trump sees everyone as his vassals. In Venezuela, that means claiming personal control of a conquered nation's oil. "Controlled by me," he declared Tuesday, four days after US forces captured their president and whisked him to jail in America. Here at home, that means punishing states that didn't vote for him. He froze $10 billion in child care, foster care, and cash assistance to California, Colorado, Minnesota, Illinois, and New York, demanding recipient Social Security numbers by January 20. His Justice Department has now sued 23 states for refusing to hand over voter registration rolls. No matter where you live, he thinks you owe him something, even if it is only bending the knee. We've emailed 5,400+ stories over 341 straight nights. Stop hoping the algorithm shows them to you. govbrief.today #GovBriefToday #Resist Subscribe (It's Free!) - https://gbounacos.substack.com [1] https://go.govbrief.today/us-venezuela-ukraine-hill [2] https://go.govbrief.today/leavitt-greenland-military [3] https://go.govbrief.today/75-killed-venezuela [4] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-drug-czar [5] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-child-funding [6] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-house-abortion [7] https://go.govbrief.today/gop-politician-sentenced [8] https://go.govbrief.today/az-ct-sued [9] https://go.govbrief.today/russia-sub-escort-tanker [10] https://go.govbrief.today/judge-orders-halligan-explain [11] https://go.govbrief.today/wyoming-abortion [12] https://go.govbrief.today/mpls-hampton-removed [13] https://go.govbrief.today/house-gop-margin-shrinks [14] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-rewrites-jan6 [15] https://go.govbrief.today/bela-fleck-cancel [16] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-venezuela-oil [17] https://go.govbrief.today/prof-resintated-kirk Subscribe (It's Free!) - https://gbounacos.substack.com
